name: Digital Marketing Fundamentals

overview.desc: Gain a solid foundation in digital marketing tools and understand how each tool can fit into overall marketing strategy. Leave class with a website you created.

desc: Gain a solid foundation in digital marketing tools and understand how each tool can fit into overall marketing strategy. Leave class with a website you created.
who_attend_desc: Digital Marketing Fundamentals is designed for:**Traditional marketers looking to expand their skillset with digital tools and strategy*Supervisors leading teams working within the digital space*Technical professionals who have a basic understanding of the tools but not the strategy driving business decisions*People looking to transition into positions within digital marketing

name: Certified Digital Marketing Professional (CDMP)

overview.desc: Deepen your understanding of email, mobile, social media and digital advertising strategy in this certification program. Leave class with a digital strategy in-hand.

desc: Deepen your understanding of email, mobile, social media and digital advertising strategy in this certification program. Leave class with a digital strategy in-hand.
course_takeaways: ***Hands-on experience working with key digital marketing tools, some of which your organization can use for free.* 			****The ability to choose the best digital marketing channels and tools, based on your organization’s goals.* 			****Insights from your instructors, who are experts in the field of digital marketing. The teachers can continue to be a professional resource after the program ends.* 			****The ability to evaluate and optimize a channel strategy, leading to meeting business goals.* 			****An actionable digital strategy for your organization, which you’ll develop during the course.* 			****A new network of professional peers, which you can turn to for support and advice long after the program ends.* 			**

name: Mini MBA

overview.desc: Gain a solid foundation in business and leadership strategy while learning skills you can put to work right away. Practice these skills with a business simulation.

desc: Gain a solid foundation in business and leadership strategy while learning skills you can put to work right away. Practice these skills with a business simulation.
course_takeaways: ***Gain a Well-rounded Perspective.*This program is taught by industry professionals with real-world experience. We balance classroom theory with actual applications, to give you the most holistic education.*****Gain Real-world Skills you Can Use on Monday Morning.*Our goal is for you to leave every session with tools you can use at work right away, to influence and strengthen your team.*****Practice your New Skills in Class.*Compete with other teams in a business simulation, making decisions and analyzing their real-world effects on a company. Sharpen your new skills in this simulation, so you’re better prepared to apply them in your workplace.*****Become More Versatile and Resilient.*Whether you own a business or work for one, the knowledge and tools you gain here will prepare you to handle any business challenge.*****Build a New Network of Professional Peers.*Turn to these professionals for support and advice long after the program ends.*****Customize Your Experience.*With a choice in online electives, you can customize your experience to best fit your background and future goals. ***

name: Certified Professional Project Manager (CPPM)

overview.desc: Build your leadership and decision-making skills while exploring best practices and tools for effective project management. Gain new information and the CPPM certification.

desc: Build your leadership and decision-making skills while exploring best practices and tools for effective project management. Gain new information and the CPPM certification.
course_takeaways: ***Learn Project Management Leadership Skills*Demonstrate your project management leadership by successfully navigating your project from initiation to closure the moment you walk away from this program.*****Choose the Right Approach*What is waterfall versus agile? You need to be able to choose the right approach based on project needs. With an understanding of traditional practices you will have the ability to determine which projects are best served using the waterfall method.*****Drive Project Success*You’ll return to work with the skills needed to improve project success and drive innovation. These skills are discussed and practiced in the classroom environment and can be applied to your projects immediately.*****Earn a Certification*By successfully completing this program you will earn the CPPM (Certified Professional Project Manager) certification through the University of St. Thomas. This certification will add credibility to your experience and demonstrate ability in waterfall methodology to current and future employers.*****Take Steps Toward PMP® Designation*Earn 35 hours of project management education from a PMI Authorized Training Partner® required for the Project Management Practitioner (PMP®) designation.*****Earn PDU credits to maintain PMI certifications*Already hold the PMP® or other PMI® credentials? Earn 35 PDUs through this program.***
who_attend_desc: Anyone who currently manages projects, products, programs or processes will benefit from the project management skills covered in this program.*Common job titles of program participants include:**IT Analyst*Account Manager*Business Consultant*Technology Manager*Sales Specialist*Process Analyst*Engineers*Brand Managers*Entrepreneurs*Strategic Planners*Quality improvement Specialist*Marketing Communications Managers*Marketing Communications Specialist**The program is also an excellent choice for anyone looking to change careers.

name: Agile Project Management

overview.desc: Dive into the agile methodology in this three-day program. Learn to complete projects more efficiently and earn a St. Thomas Certified Agile Practitioner certification (UST-CAP).

desc: Dive into the agile methodology in this three-day program. Learn to complete projects more efficiently and earn a St. Thomas Certified Agile Practitioner certification (UST-CAP).
course_takeaways: ***Add In-demand Skills*Research shows that advertised agile jobs outnumber candidates 4.59 to 1. The demand for these jobs is particularly high in several states including Minnesota, Washington, California, Oregon, New York and Massachusetts.*****Choose the Right Approach*Not all projects are alike. You need to be able to choose the right approach based on project needs. With an understanding of agile practices, you will have the ability to manage projects in a fast-changing environment.*****Drive Project Success*You’ll return to work with the skills needed to improve project success and drive innovation. Discuss and practice these skills in the classroom and apply them to your projects immediately.*****Earn a Certification*By successfully completing this program, you will earn the UST-CAP (University of St. Thomas Certified Agile Practitioner) certification through the University of St. Thomas. This certification will add credibility to your experience and demonstrate ability in agile methodologies to current and future employers.*****Take Steps Toward PMI-ACP® Designation*Earn 21 contact hours of project management training required for Agile Certified Practitioner (PMI-ACP)® designation through the Project Management Institute.*****Earn PDU Credits to Maintain PMI® Certifications*Already hold the PMP® or PgMP®? Earn 21 PDUs through this program. If you hold the PMI-RMP®, PMI-SP®, PMI-ACP®, PfMP® or PMI-PBA℠ you can earn 14 PDUs through this program.***

name: Fundraising Certificate Series: Laying the Foundation for Fund Development

overview.desc: New to fundraising? Start your fundraising career with an understanding of the terminology and the various stakeholders involved in the fundraising process.

desc: New to fundraising? Start your fundraising career with an understanding of the terminology and the various stakeholders involved in the fundraising process.

overview.desc: Prepare to tackle your nonprofit budget and planning process with tools and terminology that will give an accurate picture of the financial health of your organization.

name: Mini MBA for Nonprofit Organizations

overview.desc: Learn how to have a more effective impact in your nonprofit organization. Gain a solid foundation of skills, tools and knowledge needed to be successful in the nonprofit sector.

desc: Learn how to have a more effective impact in your nonprofit organization. Gain a solid foundation of skills, tools and knowledge needed to be successful in the nonprofit sector.
course_takeaways: ***Gain real-world skills you can use on Monday morning.*Leave every session with practical skills and knowledge you can apply at your nonprofit organization immediately.*****Enhance your influence.*Return to work with great confidence in your ability to bring new ideas and more effective decisions to your everyday work.*****Learn from experienced instructors.*Your instructors have solid backgrounds in nonprofit management. Hear their experiences and learn from their real-life examples.*****Take Steps Toward CFRE Designation.*The Mini MBA for Nonprofit Organizations is approved to provide 3.75 points of continuing education with the Certified Fundraising Executive Program (CFRE).*****Practice in Class.*Sharpen your new skills through exercises and discussion, so you’re well prepared to apply them in your workplace.*****Build a new network of professional peers,*which you can turn to for support and advice long after the program ends.***
who_attend_desc: Our Mini MBA for Nonprofit Organizations program is designed for nonprofit professionals in all stages of their careers. If you are currently working, leading or interested in joining a nonprofit organization, this program is for you.*Common program participant job titles include:**Executive Director*Site Staff*Volunteer Manager*Agency/Department Head*City Manager*Program Director*Annual Giving Director*Administrator*Compliance Director*Board Member*Volunteer*Event Coordinator*Marketing Coordinator*Program Manager*Fundraising Director/Manager*Emergency Management Director*Development/Foundation Director*Community Relations Director*Those looking to transition into their second career in a nonprofit

name: Six Sigma Yellow Belt

overview.desc: Learn about six sigma, one of the world’s most popular methods for process improvement. This one-day program gives you the basics of six sigma and tools for process improvement.

desc: Learn about six sigma, one of the world’s most popular methods for process improvement. This one-day program gives you the basics of six sigma and tools for process improvement.
course_takeaways: ***Introduce Yourself to the Six Sigma Process*This one-day investment provides the foundation of Six Sigma methodology and can help determine if you wish to pursue a career in Six Sigma.*****Become More Effective on Six Sigma Projects*Understand the terms and processes used by Green Belts and Black Belts. You will be able to provide better input as a team member after the course.*****Earn a Certification*Receive a certification in Six Sigma Yellow Belt to move your career to the next level.***
who_attend_desc: Whether you’re an entry-level employee or a manufacturing executive with many years of experience under your “belt,” this certificate program is for you. It’s also an excellent option for anyone looking to advance or change their career. Anyone who needs an overview of Six Sigma, DMAIC process and the basic tools of process improvement is encouraged to attend.*Common job titles of program participants include:**Operations Manager*Supply Chain Manager*General Manager*Functional Project Lead*Senior Project Manager*Reliability Engineer*Operating System Specialist*Lead Manufacturing Engineer*Project Engineer*Business Process Manager*Compliance Structural Engineer*Director of Operational Excellence*Warehouse operations manager*Lead Analyst/Project Manager*Business Process Improvement Consultant*Entrepreneurs and business owners

name: Strategic Social Media Marketing

overview.desc: Learn to use social media platforms to drive customer engagement and long-term loyalty. Explore various tools, why they are used and how each fit into overall strategy.

desc: Learn to use social media platforms to drive customer engagement and long-term loyalty. Explore various tools, why they are used and how each fit into overall strategy.
course_takeaways: ***Start with Strategy.*A successful social media campaign needs thought and planning before it is executed. Learn how and where to begin.*****Use Storytelling to your Advantage.*Build a social media presence and make it personal for your customer.*****Make Social Media a Priority.*Leverage social media to find the right platform to support your marketing efforts.*****Gain a New Network of Professional Peers.*Use your network as a resource for advice long after the program ends.*****Measure your Results. *Use analytics to gauge the effectiveness of your efforts. ***

name: Solving Problems with Design Thinking

overview.desc: Wicked problems, the difficult problems which resist resolution, need a creative approach. Learn how to use design thinking to lead your team or projects toward customer centric solutions with this hands-on, interactive program.

desc: Wicked problems, the difficult problems which resist resolution, need a creative approach. Learn how to use design thinking to lead your team or projects toward customer centric solutions with this hands-on, interactive program.
course_takeaways: ***Increase Your Confidence*Learn the language and philosophy behind human centered design to be more effective on teams already using this way of thinking.*****Gain Hands-on Tools*Learn the steps of this valuable innovation tool. Practice each step of the design thinking process so that you can apply it in your work.*****Shift Your Thinking*Often new ideas are developed in meetings rather than through customer insight. Change that. Involve your customers for more effective and innovative solutions.*****Increase Your Success Rate*Customer centric systems and services tend to be more successful. Learn how to apply the design thinking process to test new concepts with current or prospective customers.   *****Decrease Costs*When solutions are well designed and customers understand how to use them without assistance, it decreases support and help desk costs.*****Solve Problems More Effectively*Solve problems using empathy and a focus on the needs of the customers, key elements of the human centered design process. ***

name: Strategies for Effective Negotiation

overview.desc: Learn the art and science of negotiation with in-class practice to apply these skills. Whether negotiating via email, in-person or virtually, you will leave prepared for success.

desc: Learn the art and science of negotiation with in-class practice to apply these skills. Whether negotiating via email, in-person or virtually, you will leave prepared for success.
course_takeaways: ***Be prepared for any type of negotiation.*Learn the different types of negotiation and effective ways to approach each. Practice in class so you are ready when it counts.  * *****Choose the right tactic for the situation.*Armed with the ability to identify your counterpart’s positions and interests, you can apply framing techniques to better position yourself with leverage.*****Feel confident in your abilities.*Practice different approaches to negotiation in class, so you’re better prepared to use them at work.*****Build your network*Learn with a class of professional peers. This is a network you can turn to for support and advice long after the program ends.***

name: Fundraising Certificate Series: Budgeting for your Fundraising Program

overview.desc: Prepare to tackle your nonprofit budget and planning process with tools and terminology that will give an accurate picture of the financial health of your organization.

desc: Prepare to tackle your nonprofit budget and planning process with tools and terminology that will give an accurate picture of the financial health of your organization.
who_attend_desc: The St. Thomas Fundraising Certificate Series is ideal for:**Nonprofit leaders who want to implement a successful fundraising development plan*Individuals hoping to network with other nonprofit and fundraising professionals*Young professionals exploring career options, or transitioning to the nonprofit or fundraising sector*Experienced fundraisers seeking to improve their fundraising leadership skills*People pursuing CFRE Certification

name: Business Analytics and Data Visualization

overview.desc: Learn how to turn data into actionable insights and solve everyday business problems. Return to work with the tools and confidence to apply immediately.

desc: Learn how to turn data into actionable insights and solve everyday business problems. Return to work with the tools and confidence to apply immediately.
course_takeaways: ***Make Better, More Informed Decisions*When you know how to interpret your organization’s data, you can put it to work for you. Gain a framework for making business decisions using the analytics process.*****Use Data to Tell a Story*The ability to present data in an engaging way is valuable. Use the analytics process to present your data in a digestible format based on your audience.*****Create Clear, Focused Presentations*Lengthy, wordy PowerPoints can be boring and confusing to your audience. Discover how to use data and the right visuals to convey an idea more simply and effectively.*****Practice Using Analytics*Using case studies, you’ll practice using the analytics process and presentation skills in an environment where the fate of your business isn’t on the line.*****Hone Your Data Presentation Skills*Learn how to craft and deliver presentations that connect with your audience and help to drive positive change. Get constructive feedback from your instructors and peers.*****Build Your Professional Network*Connect with professionals who share your interest in analytics, and can serve as a source of ongoing support after the program ends.***

name: Data-Driven Marketing

overview.desc: Dive into Google Analytics with our expert instructor. Learn to capture, interpret and use data to strengthen your digital marketing efforts.

desc: Dive into Google Analytics with our expert instructor. Learn to capture, interpret and use data to strengthen your digital marketing efforts.
course_takeaways: ***Gain Customer Insights.*Marketing your product or service starts with an understanding of your customers. Use tools to discover what they want and what motivates them to engage with your company.*****Measure the Effectiveness of your Marketing Tactics.*Learn to use customer insights data to choose which marketing tactics to continue, discontinue or add to your promotional strategy.*****Use Data Insights to Plan your Marketing Strategy.*With consumer insights and data, plan the right marketing mix to reach your business goals. Use this information to help promote your plan to stakeholders.*****Understand Google Analytics.*Learn how to use the most popular source of digital analytics data.*****Confidently Communicate Your Data Insights.*Understand how to use marketing analytics and effectively communicate results to your organization’s leadership.*****Prepare for the Google Analytics IQ Exam.*Completing this program prepares you to take the Google Analytics IQ Exam, if you choose to do so.*****Gain a New Network of Professional Peers,*which you can turn to for support and advice long after the program ends.***
who_attend_desc: This program is ideal for experienced marketers looking to increase their understanding of marketing measurement. If you’re just starting out in the world of digital marketing, considering completing Digital Marketing Fundamentals prior to this program.*You would benefit from the Data-Driven Marketing program if your job includes:**Website optimization*CRM management*Marketing channel strategy or optimization*Customer insights, market research or lead generation*Measurement strategies*Media mix optimization*Content marketing, email marketing, search marketing, social media marketing or mobile marketing

name: Finance for Non-Financial Managers

overview.desc: Gain the foundation and tools you need to make better financial decisions at work. Practice in class to become a confident contributor upon returning to the office.

desc: Gain the foundation and tools you need to make better financial decisions at work. Practice in class to become a confident contributor upon returning to the office.
who_attend_desc: This program is ideal for business managers without a finance background. If you want to contribute to financial discussions and decision-making at work, but wish you had a better financial foundation, this program is for you.*Common program participant job titles include:**Entrepreneurs and business owners*Business Analyst Management Analyst*Operations Manager*Office Manager*General Manager*Sales Manager*Marketing Director*Marketing Manager*Brand Manager*Project Manager*Business Consultant

name: Influential Communication

overview.desc: Strengthen your communication skills and improve your ability to speak confidently, clearly and effectively. Apply anywhere from on-the-spot conversations to high-profile meetings.

desc: Strengthen your communication skills and improve your ability to speak confidently, clearly and effectively. Apply anywhere from on-the-spot conversations to high-profile meetings.

name: Lean Six Sigma Black Belt

overview.desc: Learn to identify, address and correct problems using this hybrid approach of lean and six sigma methodologies. Take your green belt skills to the next level in this program.

desc: Learn to identify, address and correct problems using this hybrid approach of lean and six sigma methodologies. Take your green belt skills to the next level in this program.
course_takeaways: ***Develop your Leadership Potential*A strong Black Belt needs to be a proven leader of the team. Learn communication, managerial and overall leadership presence to lead a team on high profile projects.*****Make Data-based Decisions*Perform advanced statistical analysis to determine input and output relationships. Use this data to make informed decisions on process improvement.*****Drive Project Success*Identify and reduce waste using a combination of lean and Six Sigma methodology to better the customer experience.*****Earn a Certification*By successfully completing this program you will earn a Lean Six Sigma Black Belt certification through the University of St. Thomas. This certification will add credibility to your experience and demonstrate your skills as a Six Sigma leader.***

name: The St. Thomas Executive Program (STEP)

overview.desc: Address the top 10 leadership skills needed to succeed in today's VUCA environment. The St. Thomas Executive Program (STEP) is a 9-day, 3-module program for mid-career leaders.

desc: Address the top 10 leadership skills needed to succeed in today's VUCA environment. The St. Thomas Executive Program (STEP) is a 9-day, 3-module program for mid-career leaders.
who_attend_desc: STEP is designed for high-potential, mid-career leaders in business with broad level business responsibilities. It is for leaders who want the cutting-edge skills that will prepare them for their next level or challenge of leadership responsibility. The ideal STEP candidate:**Participates in developing individuals as part of their team or a cross functional team.*Is responsible for setting and measuring business objectives that link to a larger strategy in the company*Identifies as high-performing, and as having high potential*May have the title of Director or Manager*Has experience in overseeing company initiatives or key products or services

name: The Leadership and Management Program

overview.desc: Learn the essentials of successful leadership and concepts you can apply right away. From emotional intelligence to systems thinking, return to work with a new lens.

desc: Learn the essentials of successful leadership and concepts you can apply right away. From emotional intelligence to systems thinking, return to work with a new lens.
course_takeaways: **Curriculum*The Leadership and Management Program focuses on two key areas: emotional and social intelligence, and strategic decision-making. During 6 full day sessions over the course of two weeks you’ll learn about:**Transitioning from an expert to a manager to a leader*Strategic thinking, planning and decision-making*Systems thinking*Change management and leadership*Leveraging your emotional strengths*Managing your emotions that cause performance risks*Empathy -- the key to understanding other stakeholders*Increasing your impact when influencing, inspiring, and empowering.*Developing your personal career strategy***

name: Future of Health Care Conference

overview.desc: Gain insight into the future of the health care industry at this annual conference. From affordable care to disruptive innovation, hear from those moving health care forward.

desc: Gain insight into the future of the health care industry at this annual conference. From affordable care to disruptive innovation, hear from those moving health care forward.
course_takeaways: *******01 *Benefits of This Program**Get on the balcony – spend a day out of the office learning so that you can go back and implement new ideas.*Learn from local and national health care leaders – Gain insight from those innovating from within their organizations.*Network with health care leaders – With an audience of over 250 health care professionals, you’ll have the opportunity to make connections with the movers and shakers in the industry.*Hear about new innovation and what’s ahead – As a health care leader, you know how important it is to stay current on emerging trends. ****

name: Six Sigma Green Belt Certificate

overview.desc: Take your foundational knowledge to the next level by earning a Six Sigma Green Belt Certificate. Learn how to use the DMAIC model in your process improvement projects.

desc: Take your foundational knowledge to the next level by earning a Six Sigma Green Belt Certificate. Learn how to use the DMAIC model in your process improvement projects.
who_attend_desc: From entry-level employees to manufacturing executives and professionals looking to advance or change their career, this program is perfect for anyone who already has a foundational knowledge of Six Sigma and needs advanced practical experience.*Common job titles of program participants include:**Business Process Improvement Consultant*Lead Analyst/Project Manager*Compliance Structural Engineer*Director, Performance Excellence*Warehouse Operations Manager*Director of Operational Excellence*Operations Manager*General Manager*Functional Project Lead*Senior Project Manager*Reliability Engineer*Operating System Specialist*Lead Manufacturing Engineer*Project Engineer*Data Scientist*Business Process Manager*Lean Six Sigma Consultant*Entrepreneurs and business owners

name: Mini Master of Marketing Management

overview.desc: Gain the marketing tools and strategies you need to influence customers and drive growth with this survey of marketing competencies.

desc: Gain the marketing tools and strategies you need to influence customers and drive growth with this survey of marketing competencies.

name: Decision Making and Execution

overview.desc: This program helps leaders understand how high-quality decisions are made and how poor decisions are avoided, gaining tools for making choices that result in clarity of direction and organizational alignment.

desc: This program helps leaders understand how high-quality decisions are made and how poor decisions are avoided, gaining tools for making choices that result in clarity of direction and organizational alignment.
course_takeaways: ***Determine the Right Course of Action*There are often multiple solutions to a problem. Learn how to clarify which is the best solution relative to your external market opportunities and your organizational culture.*****Measure the Quality of Your Decision*Learn the attributes of a high-quality decision. This way, you will know when you are ready to make a decision or identify what needs to be done first in order to be decision ready.*****Engage Effectively With Decision Makers*Time, organizational priorities and personal agendas clash to disrupt alignment. Practice proven methods for designing conversations that lead to up-and-down alignment and decision clarity.*****Be Better Positioned to Gain Stakeholder Buy-in*By understanding the players and what each want, you can begin creating alignment early on.*****Think More Broadly In Your Decision Making*Gain new tools to get better choices on the table and place decisions in context to help others understand what you are doing and why.*****Execute Based on Sound Decisions*Understand the industry, your organizational goals and what you should take as a given to be more effective in the execution of your decisions and strategy.***

name: Project Management for the Accidental Project Manager

overview.desc: Learn the language and approaches to project management to be better equipped when participating in projects. Use real-world examples from your own experience.

desc: Learn the language and approaches to project management to be better equipped when participating in projects. Use real-world examples from your own experience.

name: Health Care Management Principles

overview.desc: The business of health care is complex and ever-changing. Dive into the key elements driving all aspects of the industry. Return to the office with tools to guide your team into the future.

desc: The business of health care is complex and ever-changing. Dive into the key elements driving all aspects of the industry. Return to the office with tools to guide your team into the future.
course_takeaways: ***Understand the business of health care.*Incorporate core business topics such as strategy, leadership, operations, financials and analytics into your toolkit.*****Uncover the connections within the health care ecosystem.*It’s a complex industry. Hear from experienced health care professionals about how various stakeholders connect and interact with each other throughout the value chain.*****Innovate for the Future.*Learn how to strategize, plan and operate for upcoming changes in the industry – and what you can do today to succeed in the future.*****Hands-On Application*Apply what you learn in a safe environment with expert guidance so you can tackle the real challenges when you return to work.*****Feel Confident Making Big Decisions.*Be prepared to make the right decisions by understanding essential business concepts with a health care lens.*****Build a New Network of Professional Peers.*Meet others interested in the business of health care who you can rely on for support and advice long after the program ends.***
